features: Ceramic reptile water dish,Excellent for small reptile, such as turtle, lizard, frog, terrapin, gecko, spider, scorpion, snake, etc.
It can store food or water, which will offer reptile a convenient and splendid place to eat.
It will not slide all over the place when your pets is eating or drinking.
Particular structure and design can effectively prevent it from overthrow and spill.
Made by ceramic material, safe for reptile, provide comfortable mealtime for your pet.
description: This ceramic feeding bowl is safe and easy to clean. It can store food or water, which will offer reptile a convenient and splendid place to eat. Ideal for centipede, lizard, scorpion, turtle, lizard, frog, etc. The open design allows the pets to observe the insects in the food bowl and induces the predation thoughts.
Suitable for all kinds of reptiles, small pets, etc.

- Color: White.- Material: Ceramics.- Size: L: Approx. 7x7x2.1cm.          M: Approx. 5.9x5.9x1.8cm.- Made by ceramic material, safe for reptile, provide comfortable mealtime for your pet.- It can store food or water, which will offer reptile a convenient and splendid place to eat.- Excellent for small reptile, such as turtle, lizard, frog, terrapin, gecko, spider, scorpion, snake, etc.- Particular structure and design can effectively prevent it from overthrow and spill.- It will not slide all over the place when your pets is eating or drinking.- Warm Tip: Dear buyer, due to lighting effect, monitor's brightness, manual measurement and etc. There could be some slight differences in the color and size between the photo and the actual item.
